tasks.task_description: Analyze current CloudFront distributions and their configurations
Get SSL certificate ARN from old distribution
Remove custom domain alias from old us-east-1 distribution
Add custom domain alias and SSL certificate to new us-west-2 distribution
Verify custom domain now points to correct us-west-2 FAISS app
Test the application functionality with correct API endpoints

description: Fix custom domain routing for FAISS app from us-east-1 to us-west-2 CloudFront distribution
context: Analyzed CloudFront distributions: Old distribution E3SLNEZLBXY30A has custom domain alias and SSL certificate arn:aws:acm:us-east-1:039920874011:certificate/0ce5efe3-7839-4750-b825-920f909f2af0. New distribution E1YU57TN0NM68Y has no aliases configured.

Successfully removed custom domain alias from old us-east-1 distribution (E3SLNEZLBXY30A) and added custom domain alias with SSL certificate to new us-west-2 distribution (E1YU57TN0NM68Y). Both distributions are now in 'InProgress' status.

Successfully verified custom domain is now pointing to us-west-2 FAISS app. Tested application functionality - search works perfectly, returns results, shows correct usage tracking (9 remaining searches), and uses correct us-west-2 API Gateway endpoint. Issue is completely resolved.
